# session

**Instance Property**

The session this view uses to provide coaching.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var session: ARSession? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The coaching overlay monitors your app’s [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARSession] and reacts according to its tracking status. You don’t need to set this property if you set [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARCoachingOverlayView/sessionProvider] instead.

## Providing the Session

- **sessionProvider**: An object you designate that provides the current session.
